span.breadcrumb_last,.tourbrd span,.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p,ul.highlight-this-tour li,.TourDates p,.pkg-inc ul li, .pkg-exc ul li,.tour-overview p b,h2.tourDBox,.sidebar_section_col ul li a {
    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;
	-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);
    margin-top: 20px;
}

    font-size: 20px;

    padding: 10px;

    font-weight: bold;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li a {

    padding: 6px 10px;

    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 16px;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li i {

}

}

}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0px;

    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

.TourDates p {

}

.tourbrd a {
    color: #bf000c;
    font-weight: bold;
}

    min-height: .01%;

}

}

}

<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Phuket with Pattaya and Bangkok Tour Package</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/international-tours" title="International Tour Packages">International</a> » <a href="/thailand-tour-packages" title="Thailand Tour Packages">Thailand</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Bangkok Koh Samui Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c318a2d9e68_62462284" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/phuket-pattaya.jpg" alt="Phuket Pattaya Bangkok Tour" title="Phuket Pattaya Bangkok Tour" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Namaste India Trip Phuket with Pattaya and Bangkok tour package takes you across some of the most enchanting natural beauty, thrilling adventure activities and a varied avenue for entertainment. These South Eastern gems are every holiday goers and traveler’s ideal vacation spot. The white sandy beaches, fascinating landscapes, quirky sightseeing locations, fun water sports and delectable local cuisines make these places a paradise for peace seekers and adventure lovers. These places are not only a fun destination but are also known for its holy ornate sites and temples dedicated to their local deities and Lord Buddha.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Phuket Pattaya Bangkok Tour Itinerary</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrival in Phuket</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Upon arriving at Phuket our tour representative will immediately escort you to your allotted hotel where you will be spending your night. Phuket is known for being one of the most visited party destinations in the world with classy restaurants offering delectable food, soothing temples and a happening nightlife. The remainder of your day will be free for you to explore the enigmatic surrounding marketplaces before returning to the hotel.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Phuket – Phi Phi Islands</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Early in the morning after breakfast, you will be transferred to Phi Phi island, one of the most lively islands in Thailand via an exciting ferry ride, through the crystal clear water. The entire day is free for you to explore the local marketplaces where you can shop for souvenirs and gorge on some delicious food for lunch. You also have the option of indulging in some fun and thrilling water sports activities like snorkeling, water skiing, kayaking and many more (the expenses for these activities will be done by your side).</p>
<p>At the end of the day you will be escorted back to your hotel for staying the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Phuket Sightseeing Tour</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After a wholesome breakfast in the morning, you will be made to head out for a complete sightseeing tour of the city of Phuket. You will be covering places like: the Portuguese buildings, colorful marketplaces with attractive bargaining options, Wat Chalong Buddhist temple before heading out to the relaxing Rawai beach. You will also be made to visit Sea gypsy village and Cape Promthep which are the legendary landmarks of this picturesque city. Finally, late evening will be free for your leisurely activities before heading back to your hotel for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Phuket – Bangkok – Pattaya</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Post breakfast you will be escorted to the airport from where you will be made to board the flight heading towards Bangkok. Upon your arrival at Bangkok, you will be escorted by our tour representative to Pattaya. After covering a 2 hour long road journey you will finally reach this wonderful beach destination.</p>
<p>Upon arriving at Pattaya and after getting checked in to your allotted hotel here you will be free to shop till you drop, gorge on mouthwatering Thai dishes and go for the famous relaxing Thai massage. Later in the evening, you have the option of witnessing the world – famous Cabaret of Alcazar before heading back to your hotel for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Coral Island Tour in Pattaya</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After breakfast, you will be made to commence on a fun-filled visit to Coral Island (also known as Koh Larn Island) where you will be transferred via a speedboat. A day visit to this island offers some of the most relaxing yet thrilling experiences like, sitting by the clear water or opting for water sports activities like deep sea diving, snorkeling, kayaking and many more. You can also go on an underwater walking experience which will bring you up close and personal with the underwater world. Remember to carry your own equipment since there are no shops available here which offer these services.</p>
<p>By the end of the day you will be made to head back to Pattaya where you will be spending the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Bangkok City and Temple Tour</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After having a wholesome breakfast in the morning you will be made to head out for a city-wide sightseeing and temple tour. Bangkok is not only known for its impeccable shopping destinations, spas, fun nightlife but is also popular for its holy sites, temples and monasteries. The places which you will be covering include: Wat Traimit – which is home to a 5.5 ton of solid gold Buddha statue; Wat Pho – one of the largest and oldest shrines of its type and also home to the reclining statue of Buddha; gems gallery will be your next destination where you can shop till you drop for precious and soothing gems. After a day filled with spirituality and fun you will finally be made to head back to your hotel where you will be staying the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 :</span>Bangkok (leisure Day)</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Your entire day is free for you to perform your leisurely activities or relax the entire day. You also have the option of visiting one of the famous and exciting open zoo and Leisure Park in Thailand offering a huge variety of entertainment for all of its visitors. There are several lunch and eating joints available for visitors inside the park.</p>
<p>In the evening you have the option of gorging on some traditional Thai cuisines and shop for some memorable souvenirs from the teeming marketplaces.</p>
<p>Later in the evening, you will head back to your hotel for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 8 :</span>Bangkok Departure</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Early in the morning after breakfast, you will be made to transfer to Bangkok international airport from where you will catch the flight heading towards your onward destination, hence commencing your tour package with us.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

These South Eastern gems are every...
